mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, CLASSNUM, CLASSDATE, CLASSCAPACITY FROM (SELECT * FROM ONEDAY_ClASS ORDER BY CLASSNUM DESC)) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10 +1 and (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}) * 10

SELECT A.CLASSNUM, A.CLASSDATE, A.CLASSCAPACITY, B.CLASSAPPLICANTSNUM, B.MEMBERNUM, C.MEMBERNAME, C.MEMBERADDRESS, C.MEMBERTEL, C.MEMBERPHONE, C.MEMBEREMAIL FROM ONEDAY_ClASS A JOIN ONEDAY_CLASS_INFO B ON (A.CLASSNUM = B.CLASSNUM) JOIN MEMBER C ON (B.MEMBERNUM = C.MEMBERNUM) WHERE A.CLASSNUM = #{classNum}
